duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct immigration physicals and complete the I693 form in compliance with UCSIS regulations.
Review past medical history, vaccine history, and required testing for each client.
Accomplish the physical and complete the I693 form within 15-20 minutes per client.
Establish and expand immigration physical services at corporate locations throughout the US.
Seek certification as a Civil Surgeon to provide the service at the company's offices in the area.
Complete paperwork and requirements to become a designated Civil Surgeon.

education_certification.credential: Medical degree and certification as a Civil Surgeon
